title: 😊Need SPACE? Massive Floorplan Close to Downtown😊
posting_body: ❤️ Impeccable location on South Congress allows you all the hot spots of SoCo outside your door.
🚶‍♂️ Walk to many of the hottest restaurants and bars of South Austin.
🤩 Community offers great outdoor pool surrounded by oak trees, grilling stations, 24 hr gym and work from home stations.
Gated garage parking!
🛋️ Apartment offers light colored wood-style flooring, white quartz countertops, open living spaces, washer and dryer in-unit
